about_the_game:
Build, Create, PLAY! Experience the ultimate convergence of creativity and technological engineering in TinkerTech. Inspired by model kit building, TinkerTech allows you to design, construct, and mobilize builds made out of many individual blocks.

You have the power to create anything from cars, robots, walking characters, or even buildings. Each block you use can be customized, giving you the control to paint, sculpt, and design unique creations. Advanced users even have the option to design 3D models for use in-game.

TinkerTech also allows you to host multiplayer rooms for other players to join. Display your creations and hang out, race, or battle!

Future versions of TinkerTech will add support for Logic gate systems, scripting, and much more!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

short_description: TinkerTech is a game that allows players to design, construct and showcase their unique builds made of customizable blocks. Race, battle or socialize with your creations in multiplayer rooms.
